languages.text: {n}Татуированный ксенос, задумчиво вгоняющий зазубренные иглы в собственные десны, едко хмыкает:{/n} "Ядовитому шепоту стоит соответствовать своему имени. Иначе кабал Уязвленных небес начнет соответствовать своему и прольет твою кровь на Темный город, языкастая стерва".

traits.locale_text: {n}Татуированный ксенос перестает вгонять зазубренные иглы в десны своей жертве и смотрит на вас.{/n} "Нет, однако же я не прочь поразвлечься! Что угодно лучше, чем смотреть на жалкие потуги Ядовитого Шепота по ублажению друг друга".
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."
languages.original_text: {n}Татуированный ксенос, задумчиво вгоняющий зазубренные иглы в собственные десны, едко хмыкает:{/n} "Ядовитому шепоту стоит соответствовать своему имени. Иначе кабал Уязвленных небес начнет соответствовать своему и прольет твою кровь на Темный город, языкастая стерва".

Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to its and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

languages.text: {n}Son interlocuteur, un Drukhari tatoué en train de se planter distraitement des aiguilles dentelées dans les gencives, lui répond d'un air moqueur :{/n} « Le Murmure empoisonné ne mérite vraiment pas son nom. Prenez garde à ce que les Cieux blessés se décident à prouver qu'ils méritent le leur en faisant pleuvoir votre sang sur la Cité Crépusculaire, misérable vermine effrontée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son interlocuteur, un Drukhari tatoué en train de se planter distraitement des aiguilles dentelées dans les gencives, lui répond d'un air moqueur :{/n} « Le Murmure empoisonné ne mérite vraiment pas son nom. Prenez garde à ce que les Cieux blessés se décident à prouver qu'ils méritent le leur en faisant pleuvoir votre sang sur la Cité Crépusculaire, misérable vermine effrontée. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: {n}与她交谈的那个黑暗灵族浑身纹满了纹身，此刻正心不在焉地将锯齿状的尖扎进自己的牙龈，哼了一声，作为回应。{/n}“毒语阴谋团真该加把劲才对，否则等裂空阴谋团打算动真格的时候，你们就要血流成河了，你这个尖酸刻薄的讨厌鬼。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

traits.locale_text: {n}与她交谈的那个黑暗灵族浑身纹满了纹身，此刻正心不在焉地将锯齿状的尖扎进自己的牙龈，哼了一声，作为回应。{/n}“毒语阴谋团真该加把劲才对，否则等裂空阴谋团打算动真格的时候，你们就要血流成河了，你这个尖酸刻薄的讨厌鬼。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: {n}全身タトゥーだらけで、自分の歯茎にギザギザ状の針を無心に刺しているデュカーリが嘲笑気味に彼女に答えた。{/n}「『毒の囁き』は名前負けせぬようにしなければな。そうでなければ名実そろった陰謀団『傷つきし空』が、仄暗き都でお前を血祭りにあげてしまうだろうから。この口汚いウジ虫め」
languages.original_text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

traits.locale_text: {n}全身タトゥーだらけで、自分の歯茎にギザギザ状の針を無心に刺しているデュカーリが嘲笑気味に彼女に答えた。{/n}「『毒の囁き』は名前負けせぬようにしなければな。そうでなければ名実そろった陰謀団『傷つきし空』が、仄暗き都でお前を血祭りにあげてしまうだろうから。この口汚いウジ虫め」
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: {n}Daraufhin höhnt der mit Tätowierungen übersäte Drukhari, den sie anspricht und der sich gedankenverloren mit gezackten Nadeln im eigenen Zahnfleisch herumbohrt.{/n} "Das giftige Geflüster sollte lernen, seinem Namen gerecht zu werden. Andernfalls wird die Kabale der verwundeten Himmel ihrem Namen gerecht und sorgt dafür, dass die Dunkle Stadt mit Eurem Blut gesäumt wird, scharfzüngige Pest."
languages.original_text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Daraufhin höhnt der mit Tätowierungen übersäte Drukhari, den sie anspricht und der sich gedankenverloren mit gezackten Nadeln im eigenen Zahnfleisch herumbohrt.{/n} "Das giftige Geflüster sollte lernen, seinem Namen gerecht zu werden. Andernfalls wird die Kabale der verwundeten Himmel ihrem Namen gerecht und sorgt dafür, dass die Dunkle Stadt mit Eurem Blut gesäumt wird, scharfzüngige Pest."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: {n}Su interlocutor, un Drukhari cubierto de tatuajes que se hurga distraídamente las encías con unas agujas serradas, reprime una carcajada.{/n} «El Susurro Venenoso debería hacer honor a su nombre. De lo contrario, la kábala de los Cielos Heridos hará honor al suyo y lloverá sangre sobre la Ciudad Siniestra, alimaña de lengua bífida».
languages.original_text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su interlocutor, un Drukhari cubierto de tatuajes que se hurga distraídamente las encías con unas agujas serradas, reprime una carcajada.{/n} «El Susurro Venenoso debería hacer honor a su nombre. De lo contrario, la kábala de los Cielos Heridos hará honor al suyo y lloverá sangre sobre la Ciudad Siniestra, alimaña de lengua bífida».
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: {n}Kadının hitap ettiği, üzeri dövmelerle kaplı olan Drukhari; dalgın bir biçimde diş etine tırtıklı iğneler sokmakla meşgul. Kadına cevap verirken dudak büküyor.{/n} "Zehirli Fısıltı, adını layığıyla taşımayı öğrenmeli... Yoksa Yaralı Gökler Kabalı, kendi adını layığıyla taşıdığını kanıtlamak için Kara Şehir'i kana bular. Sivri dilli haşere seni."
languages.original_text: {n}The tattoo-covered Drukhari she is addressing, who is absent-mindedly sticking serrated needles into his own gums, scoffs in response.{/n} "The Poisonous Whisper should learn to live up to their name. Lest the Kabal of the Wounded Skies live up to theirs and make you bleed upon the Dark City, you sharp-tongued pest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadının hitap ettiği, üzeri dövmelerle kaplı olan Drukhari; dalgın bir biçimde diş etine tırtıklı iğneler sokmakla meşgul. Kadına cevap verirken dudak büküyor.{/n} "Zehirli Fısıltı, adını layığıyla taşımayı öğrenmeli... Yoksa Yaralı Gökler Kabalı, kendi adını nasıl taşıdığını kanıtlamak için Kara Şehri kanınıza bular. Sivri dilli haşere seni."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM
